metadata.synopsis: Trinoda yells out to the assembled Guild and Zhent forces, ready to fight
metadata.how_to_trigger: CTY_Main_AOrigin Debugbook:Minsc > Abandoned Cistern > Go to Roah BribeStart combat by running through conversationQuickly teleport to:S_LOW_Guildhall_ZhentLeader_CombatStartPoint9431524b-e12d-4b91-a976-743021cf59a4

0.speaker: Trinoda
0.text: Clock's ticking, Guildies! Will it be Nine-Fingers alone, or all of you with her?
0.context: NodeContext: Calling out to Guild with threat / offer - she'll give the order to have them all killed if they don't hand over NF.
